comment:
Ca+2	Mg+2	Na+	Cl-	SO4-2	HCO3-
100	0	0	175	90	0
Mash Water: 
CaCl2 (Calcium Chloride) - 3 grams
CaSO4 (Gypsum) - 2 grams
Campden Tablet - 1/4th of a tablet
Lactic Acid - 5 ml (for Mash pH ~5.3)
Sparge Water:
CaCl2 (Calcium Chloride) - 2 grams
CaSO4 (Gypsum) - 2 grams
Campden Tablet - 1/4th of a tablet
Lactic Acid - 1 ml
